1114800.name: HellCat Redux
1114800.description:
HellCat Redux comes with a bunch of improvements and new features.


The evil enemy took our hero's girlfriend, sent unprecedented troubles to Earth, moreover, he sharpened the main character into the maze of monochrome hell.
The main character is a cat. And he has nothing left but to arm himself in the fight against the army of devilish creatures and become the HellCat.

Go in search of truth into the depths of purgatory with a cat armed to the teeth in a cute red scarf.
Pixel top-down shooter under an explosive retrowave soundtrack.
1114800.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 捷克语
